LANDING.TITLE: Welcome to Sammelalbum
LANDING.SUBTITLE: The exchange portal for our club
LANDING.DESCRIPTION: This portal is only as a project to make for the club it easier to perform the exchange of stickers and that as soon as the interrest is gone I'll close again this website and the data will be deleted.
LANDING.PRIVACY_HINT: Further details regarding data usage can be found in the

FEATURES.MANAGE_DESC: Keep a complete overview of your sticker collection at all times. Easily mark which stickers you already own and which ones are still missing to complete your album. The intuitive interface makes managing your duplicate stickers a breeze. This way, you always know exactly what you can offer for trade.
FEATURES.MATCHES_DESC: Our intelligent algorithm automatically finds the perfect exchange partners for you. It compares your missing stickers with the duplicates of other users and instantly shows you matching results. You no longer have to painstakingly search through lists or write messages just to find someone. Save time and focus on completing your collection.
FEATURES.EXCHANGES_DESC: Organize your trades directly through the portal. Propose an exchange, negotiate details, and track the status until the stickers have safely arrived in your hands. The system helps you keep track of open, accepted, and completed trades. This makes trading safe, transparent, and efficient for everyone involved.

REGISTER.TITLE: Create your account
REGISTER.SUBTITLE: Create your new account
REGISTER.PRIVACY_HINT: Only first name, last name and contact information are shown to the exchange partner. All other information is only used for login or sending notification emails.
REGISTER.LOGIN_LINK: Already have an account? Sign in
REGISTER.ERROR: Registration failed. Please check your inputs and validation code.

MATCHES.TITLE: Matches
MATCHES.DESC: See who has what you need

EXCHANGES.TITLE: Exchange Requests
EXCHANGES.CONTACT_INFO_WARNING: Note: The name and contact details of the person will be visible as soon as they confirm interest in a possible transaction.

CREATE_MODAL.TITLE: Create New Offers
CREATE_MODAL.STICKER_IDS_HINT: Enter one sticker ID per line
CREATE_MODAL.FAIR_TRADE_WARNING: Sales should be fair and correspond to the card's purchase value!
CREATE_MODAL.ERROR_NO_TYPE: Please select at least one offer type
CREATE_MODAL.ERROR_NO_IDS: Please enter at least one valid sticker ID
CREATE_MODAL.ERROR_GENERAL: Error creating offers. Please try again.

DELETE_MODAL.TITLE: Delete Offers
DELETE_MODAL.CONFIRM: Do you really want to delete {{count}} offer(s)? This action cannot be undone.
DELETE_MODAL.ERROR_GENERAL: Error deleting offers. Please try again.

CREATE_MODAL.TITLE: Create New Searches
CREATE_MODAL.STICKER_IDS_HINT: Enter one sticker ID per line
CREATE_MODAL.ERROR_NO_IDS: Please enter at least one valid sticker ID
CREATE_MODAL.ERROR_GENERAL: Error creating searches. Please try again.

DELETE_MODAL.TITLE: Delete Searches
DELETE_MODAL.CONFIRM: Do you really want to delete {{count}} search(es)? This action cannot be undone.
DELETE_MODAL.ERROR_GENERAL: Error deleting searches. Please try again.

MATCHES.TITLE: Possible Exchange Requests
MATCHES.PRIVACY_HINT: Note: The name and contact details of the person will be visible as soon as they have confirmed interest in a potential transaction.
MATCHES.FAIRNESS_HINT: Note: Every provider is encouraged to ensure that the sale is fair and corresponds to the purchase value of the card!

EXCHANGE_MODAL.TITLE: Create Exchange Request
EXCHANGE_MODAL.EXCHANGE_DESC: Select items to give and receive. You can add multiple pairs.
EXCHANGE_MODAL.GIFT_DESC: Select the stickers you want to receive from the other person.
EXCHANGE_MODAL.CLOSE_WARNING_DESC: This will complete the exchange and remove the cards from your lists. This action cannot be undone.
